synopsis: In a city without its information broker, the residents of Ikebukuro spend their day off in various ways. Some go shopping with their families; others spend time with their lovers and friends. Some conceal the spark of new determination in their hearts, while others take action- spurred on by the seeds sown by the information broker. The hint of an uproar lurks beneath the surface of what seems to be a peaceful, ordinary day. Far from it all, though, Izaya waits all day for “someone”. And that “someone”… is coming to kill.

Granted an unexpected vacation thanks to Izaya’s injuries, Namie Yagiri is nevertheless busy gathering information on her beloved younger brother, Seiji. Her days are filled with the joy of glimpsing Seiji’s daily life through this information for which she spares no effort, nor expenses. On the other hand, however, her heart is suffused with hatred for Mika Harima, the young girl who’s always by her brother’s side. Frustrated by her existence, Namie makes up her mind to eliminate her, but…

title.jp: En wa Ina Mono, Ajina Mono

synopsis: Mizuki Akabayashi, an Awakusu-kai leader, is also known as the “Red Devil of Awakusu.” He detests drugs, and keeps watch over the city of Ikebukuro, consistently. He’s the prime suspect of killing the boss of his former organization. What is the reason that he hates drugs with every fiber of his being? Why is he the prime suspect for murdering his boss? It all started six years ago, on the night of a new moon - the night that he met “The Slasher.”

title.jp: Hito no Uwasa mo Shichijuu Gonichi

synopsis:
The city is rife with rumors about the “most powerful man in Ikebukuro.”
“He’s injured, he’s walking around with a woman, he’s even got a kid with him.”
Varona is also a part of these rumors laden with half-truths. Having lost her sense of purpose after being defeated by Shizuo, she starts working with the debt collectors, at Dennis’ suggestion, but… 
Elsewhere in the city, the men who’ve swallowed these rumors start launching their campaigns to take down “Ikebukuro’s most powerful.”

Summertime has arrived. The Dollars’ internal purges continue. Anri is uncomfortable with Mikado’s behavior, while Masaomi worries about him from afar. Ruri, a popular idol singer, is being harassed by a stalker. The stalker is thought to be a member of the Dollars. Kasuka and Ruri turn to Shizuo, hoping to obtain some information. However…
With all these different emotions in play, the city starts to come alive.

He was in love with Ruri Hijiribe. That was the reason why he became a stalker, and loved her so intensely that he wanted to destroy her soul. All the suffering Ruri had gone through alone, and the reason for the emergence of the bloodthirsty killer, Hollywood, will be revealed. They are memories all too repugnant…
Meanwhile, Masaomi, having made up his mind to return to Ikebukuro, shows up before a certain person.

The stalker is targeting everyone who has had anything to do with Ruri. Masaomi, who’s with Shizuo, also gets dragged into all the turmoil, and runs into the Blue Squares. Learning that Anri is in danger and that Mikado is somehow involved, Masaomi sets off to discover the truth, but…
And now the information broker, having returned to Ikebukuro, is about to launch a new scheme.

title.jp: Kuchi ni Mitsu, Kokoro ni Hari

synopsis: Amphisbaena is an outfit which runs an underground casino, and Heaven's Slave is a gang of drug dealers. Even as dubious rumors swirl, no one can figure out who these two groups really are. The Awakusu gang hires Izaya to do some digging, but he’s been abducted by Amphisbaena. The organization’s No. 2, Mimizu, torments him in an attempt to wring some information out of him.

Using multiple false identities, Izaya continues to work behind the scenes. One of those names is “Nakura.” It was twelve years ago that Izaya acquired this name. Izaya and Shinra’s first encounter is told by Shinra which recalls his fateful relationship with “Nakura,” which continues to this day… And now, Izaya asks Celty to deliver a certain package.

Various people begin making moves concerning the Dollars. Learning of Mikado's current situation, Masaomi resurrects the Yellow Scarves and enlists the aid of Kadota to destroy the Dollars. And Aoba, who's working side by side with Mikado, is reunited with his older brother. Meanwhile, the incident triggered by Heaven's Slave's dealings takes an even more complicated turn thanks to Yodogiri's intervention.

Various people begin making moves concerning the Dollars. Learning of Mikado's current situation, Masaomi resurrects the Yellow Scarves and enlists the aid of Kadota to destroy the Dollars. And Aoba, who's working side by side with Mikado, is reunited with his older brother. Meanwhile, the incident triggered by Heaven's Slave's dealings takes an even more complicated turn thanks to Yodogiri's intervention.

The various sparks smoldering all over the city explode into a huge disturbance, consuming Ikebukuro. The battle between the Dollars and the Toramaru; the person pulling all the strings, Aoba; Varona’s fierce pursuit of her prey; Celty, hot on the heels of the abducted Akane; Shizuo, still on the run; Izaya, observing the chaos in the city from afar, a smirk on his face. What lies ahead for them all? And amid all the chaos, what kind of answer does Mikado offer?
